title: Multiplying the Numerator and Denominator
text: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get $$\frac{\left(12x-6x^2\right) \left(x^2+11x+24\right)}{\left(x^2+8x\right) \left(x^2-4\right)}$$
speech: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get  fraction, parentheses, 12 x minus 6 x squared  times parentheses, x squared plus 11 x plus 24 , over, parentheses, x squared plus 8 x  times, parentheses, x squared minus 4, ,
pacedSpeech: We can multiply the numerator and denominators to get  this expression

title: Simplifying if Necessary
text: This fraction can be simplified through factoring. $$\frac{\left(12x-6x^2\right) \left(x^2+11x+24\right)}{\left(x^2+8x\right) \left(x^2-4\right)}=\frac{-6x\left(x-2\right) \left(x+8\right) \left(x+3\right)}{x\left(x+8\right) \left(x+2\right) \left(x-2\right)}=\frac{-6\left(x+3\right)}{x+2}$$
speech: This fraction can be simplified through factoring.  fraction, parentheses, 12 x minus 6 x squared  times parentheses, x squared plus 11 x plus 24 , over, parentheses, x squared plus 8 x  times, parentheses, x squared minus 4, ,  is equal to fraction, negative 6 x, parentheses x minus 2,  times, parentheses x plus 8,  times, parentheses x plus 3, , over, x, parentheses x plus 8,  times, parentheses x plus 2,  times, parentheses x minus 2, ,  is equal to fraction, negative 6 times, parentheses x plus 3, , over, x plus 2,
pacedSpeech: This fraction can be simplified through factoring.  this expression
